name: Eternal Run
description:
Game made to Ludum Dare 47 where the theme was Stuck in a lood. In the game you are an athlete who is doomed to run the course over and over again and kill as many zombies as you can.

Controls:

Move: WASD

Aim: Mouse

Shoot: Mouse 1

Reload: R

Sprint: Left Shift

Game made by kovalok

Source: https://github.com/lniinikorpi/LudumDare47
